Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
CPU
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Jackaroo game, holding a hand of cards, marbles, and managing the selected card and marbles for play.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name, Colour colour)
    Constructs a Player with a specified name and associated colour.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, Colour colour)
      Constructs a Player with a specified name and associated colour. Initializes the player's hand, marbles, and other game-related properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      colour - The player's associated colour, defining their safe zones and marbles.

  • Method Details

    • getHand

      public ArrayList<Card> getHand()
      Retrieves the player's current hand of cards.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of cards in the player's hand.

    • setHand

      public void setHand(ArrayList<Card> hand)
      Sets the player's hand to the provided list of cards.
      Parameters:
      hand - The ArrayList of cards to assign as the player's hand.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the player's name.
      Returns:
      The name of the player.

    • getColour

      public Colour getColour()
      Retrieves the player's associated colour.
      Returns:
      The Colour representing the player's safe zones and marbles.

    • getMarbles

      public ArrayList<Marble> getMarbles()
      Retrieves the marbles owned by the player.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of the player's marbles.

    • getSelectedCard

      public Card getSelectedCard()
      Retrieves the currently selected card for play.
      Returns:
      The Card that the player has selected.
